long_description: The mid-sized Spy Marshall women's snow goggles feature a spherical lens with a versatile tint and a fog-combatting design to keep your sight lines clear when you're on the mountain. Pink lens has 23.4% visible light transmission (VLT) and a multilayer pink mirror finish to enhance definition and reduce eye fatigue on bright, sunny days. Spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for a wide field of vision with minimal distortion. Double-layer thermal lens creates a thermal barrier between the cold outside air and the warm air next to your face, helping reduce fogging. Antifog and antiscratch lens treatments help keep your vision clear and distortion-free. Strategically placed frame vents increase airflow to reduce fogging; flexible polyurethane frame ensures a comfortable fit. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Wide adjustable strap is backed with silicone ribbing so it stays in place, whether you're wearing a helmet or not. The Spy Marshall snow goggles are designed to fit medium-sized faces.
short_description: The mid-sized Spy Marshall women's snow goggles feature a spherical lens with a versatile tint and a fog-combatting design to keep your sight lines clear when you're on the mountain.
